summary: CLUTCH DOES NOT WORK PROPERLY.  THE MOTORCYCLE WILL NOT GO INTO NEUTRAL VERY EASILY, NEVER ON THE FIRST TRY, BIKE STALLS OUT AND SHIFTING IS DIFFICULT.  NEVER HAS SHIFTED EASILY.  MAKES SAFELY DRIVING DIFFICULT WHEN STRUGGLING TO SHIFT.  I PLAN TO TAKE TO DEALER AND HAVE CLUTCH ASSEMBLY CHECKED.  *JB
